name.ar: فويس آوت: تحويل النص إلى كلام

short.ar: استخدم تحويل النص إلى كلام لقراءة أي صفحة ويب أو مستند Google أو PDF أو كتاب بأصوات طبيعية.
short.am,bn,en,en_AU,en_GB,en_US,es_419,fa,gu,: Use text to speech to read any webpage, Google Doc, PDF, or book with natural sounding voices.
short.bg: Използвайте текст-в-реч за четене на уеб страница, Google Документ, PDF или книга с естествени гласове.
short.ca: Utilitzeu la conversió de text a veu per llegir qualsevol pàgina web, document de Google, PDF o llibre amb veus naturals.
short.cs: Použijte převod textu na řeč k přečtení jakékoli webové stránky, dokumentu Google, PDF nebo knihy s přirozeně znějícími hlasy.
short.da: Brug tekst-til-tale til at læse enhver webside, Google-dokument, PDF eller bog med naturligt lydende stemmer.
short.de: Verwenden Sie Text-zu-Sprache, um jede Webseite, Google-Dokument, PDF oder Buch mit natürlich klingenden Stimmen zu lesen.
short.el: Χρησιμοποιήστε κείμενο σε ομιλία για να διαβάσετε ιστοσελίδες, Έγγραφα Google, PDF ή βιβλία με φυσικές φωνές.
short.es: Utiliza la conversión de texto a voz para leer cualquier página web, documento de Google, PDF o libro con voces naturales.
short.et: Kasuta teksti kõneks muutmist, et lugeda mis tahes veebilehte, Google dokumenti, PDF-i või raamatut loomuliku kõlaga häältega.
short.fi: Käytä tekstistä puheeksi -toimintoa lukeaksesi verkkosivun, Google-dokumentin, PDF:n tai kirjan luonnollisilla äänillä.
short.fil: Gamitin ang text-to-speech upang basahin ang anumang webpage, Google Doc, PDF, o libro na may natural na tunog ng mga boses.
short.fr: Utilisez la synthèse vocale pour lire n'importe quelle page Web, document Google, PDF ou livre avec des voix naturelles.
short.he: השתמש בהמרת טקסט לדיבור כדי לקרוא כל דף אינטרנט, מסמך Google, PDF או ספר עם קולות טבעיים.
short.hi: प्राकृतिक ध्वनि वाली आवाज़ों के साथ किसी भी वेबपेज, Google डॉक्स, PDF या पुस्तक को पढ़ने के लिए टेक्स्ट-टू-स्पीच का उपयोग करें।
short.hu: Használja a szöveg-beszéd átalakítást bármilyen weboldal, Google dokumentum, PDF vagy könyv természetes hangzású olvasásához.
short.id: Gunakan teks-ke-ucapan untuk membaca halaman web, Google Dokumen, PDF, atau buku dengan suara yang terdengar alami.
short.it: Usa la sintesi vocale per leggere qualsiasi pagina web, documento Google, PDF o libro con voci naturali.
short.ja: テキスト読み上げを使用して、任意のウェブページ、Googleドキュメント、PDF、または本を自然な音声で読み上げます。
short.ko: 텍스트 음성 변환을 사용하여 자연스러운 소리의 음성으로 웹페이지, Google 문서, PDF 또는 책을 읽습니다.
short.lt: Naudokite teksto į kalbą, kad skaitytumėte tinklalapius, „Google“ dokumentus, PDF ar knygas natūraliais balsais.
short.lv: Izmantojiet teksta pārvēršanu runā, lai lasītu jebkuru tīmekļa lapu, Google dokumentu, PDF vai grāmatu ar dabiskām balsīm.
short.ms: Gunakan teks-ke-ucapan untuk membaca mana-mana halaman web, Dokumen Google, PDF, atau buku dengan suara yang terdengar alami.
short.nl: Gebruik tekst-naar-spraak om elke webpagina, Google-document, PDF of boek met natuurlijk klinkende stemmen te lezen.
short.no: Bruk tekst-til-tale for å lese hvilken som helst nettside, Google-dokument, PDF eller bok med naturlig lydende stemmer.
short.pl: Użyj tekstu na mowę, aby przeczytać dowolną stronę internetową, dokument Google, PDF lub książkę z naturalnie brzmiącymi głosami.
short.pt_BR,pt_PT: Use a conversão de texto para fala para ler qualquer página da web, documento do Google, PDF ou livro com vozes naturais.
short.ro: Utilizați conversia text-vorbire pentru a citi orice pagină web, document Google, PDF sau carte cu voci naturale.
short.ru: Используйте текст в речь для чтения веб-страниц, документов Google, PDF или книг с естественными голосами.
short.sk: Použite prevod textu na reč na čítanie webových stránok, Google dokumentov, PDF alebo kníh s prirodzenými hlasmi.
short.sl: Uporabite pretvorbo besedila v govor za branje spletnih strani, dokumentov Google, PDF-jev ali knjig z naravnimi glasovi.
short.sr: Користите текст-у-говор да прочитате било коју веб страницу, Google документ, PDF или књигу са природним гласовима.
short.sv: Använd text-till-tal för att läsa vilken webbsida, Google-dokument, PDF eller bok som helst med naturligt ljudande röster.
short.th: ใช้ข้อความเป็นคำพูดเพื่ออ่านหน้าเว็บ, เอกสาร Google, PDF หรือหนังสือใดๆ ด้วยเสียงที่เป็นธรรมชาติ
short.tr: Herhangi bir web sayfasını, Google Dokümanı, PDF'yi veya kitabı doğal seslerle okumak için metin okuma özelliğini kullanın.
short.uk: Використовуйте текст у мовлення для читання веб-сторінок, Google документів, PDF або книг природними голосами.
short.vi: Sử dụng chuyển văn bản thành giọng nói để đọc bất kỳ trang web, tài liệu Google, PDF hoặc sách nào với giọng nói tự nhiên.
short.zh_CN: 使用文本转语音功能，以自然的语音朗读任何网页、Google文档、PDF或书籍。
short.zh_TW: 使用文字轉語音功能，以自然的語音朗讀任何網頁、Google文檔、PDF或書籍。

long.ar,bg,cs,da,de,el,et,fi,fil,fr,he,hi,hu,:
Voice Out text-to-speech extension lets you read aloud any webpage, Google Doc, PDF, webpage, or ebook with clarity and precision. It brings your documents to life in over 30 languages and 130 natural-sounding voices.

Key Features:

➤ Extensive Language Support: Experience the freedom to listen in more than 30 languages, accommodating a global audience and a wide range of linguistic needs.

➤ Vast Voice Selection: Choose from over 130 voices to find the tone and pace that suit your listening preferences. Our voices aren’t just robotic; they’re crafted to sound natural and engaging.

➤ Multi-Format Compatibility: Whether it’s web articles, official documents in Google Docs or PDFs, or entire books, Voice Out handles them with ease. Enjoy seamless integration with all major text formats.

➤ Customizable Listening Experience: Adjust the speed, pitch, and volume of the speech. Tailor every reading to match your personal or environmental needs.

➤ Custom Voices: Supports voices from OpenAI, Google, Microsoft and Amazon using API keys. 

➤ Accessibility Options: Designed with accessibility in mind, Voice Out is a valuable tool for users with dyslexia, visual impairments, or anyone who benefits from auditory learning.

➤ User-Friendly Interface: Activate Voice Out with just a click! Use it directly on any webpage or import your files for an instant read-aloud experience.

➤ Educational and Professional Utility: Perfect for students, professionals, and casual readers. Listen to your study material, absorb lengthy reports without strain, or enjoy your favorite blogs and books while multitasking.

How Voice Out Works:

1. Install and Navigate: Simply add Voice Out to your browser and navigate to any text-based content.
2. Activate: Click the Voice Out icon or use intuitive keyboard shortcuts to start listening.
3. Customize: Easily access settings to change voices or adjust reading parameters like speed to enhance your listening experience.
4. Enjoy: Transform any text into speech and enjoy listening to content as you browse, work, or relax.

For support or if you have any feedback, reach us at support@voiceout.app
long.am,bn,ca,en,en_AU,en_GB,en_US,es,es_419,:
Voice Out Text to Speech (TTS) extension lets you read aloud any webpage, Google Doc, PDF, webpage, or ebook with clarity and precision. Experience the power of advanced text to speech technology that brings your documents to life in over 30 languages and 130 natural-sounding voices.

Key Text To Speech Features:

➤ Multilingual Text To Speech: Listen in more than 30 languages, accommodating a global audience and a wide range of linguistic needs.

➤ Vast Voice Selection: Choose from over 130 voices to find the tone and pace that suit your listening preferences. Our voices aren’t just robotic; they’re crafted to sound natural and engaging.

➤ Smart Text Detection: Our Text To Speech AI automatically identifies and reads the main content on any webpage.

➤ Multi-Format Compatibility: Whether it’s web articles, official documents in Google Docs or PDFs, or entire books, Voice Out handles them with ease. Enjoy seamless integration with all major text formats.

➤ Customizable Text To Speech Experience: Adjust the speed, pitch, and volume of the speech. Tailor every reading to match your personal or environmental needs.

➤ Custom Voices: Supports voices from OpenAI, Google, Microsoft and Amazon using API keys. 

➤ Accessibility Options: Designed with accessibility in mind, Voice Out is a valuable tool for users with dyslexia, visual impairments, or anyone who benefits from auditory learning.

➤ User-Friendly Interface: Activate Voice Out with just a click! Use it directly on any webpage or import your files for an instant read-aloud experience.

➤ Educational and Professional Utility: Perfect for students, professionals, and casual readers. Listen to your study material, absorb lengthy reports without strain, or enjoy your favorite blogs and books while multitasking.

How Voice Out Works:

1. Install the Voice Out Text To Speech extension.
2. Navigate to any text-based website or upload a document at https://voiceout.app/readpdf/
3. Click the Voice Out icon to active text to speech or use intuitive keyboard shortcuts to start listening.
4. Easily access settings to change voices or adjust reading parameters like speed to enhance your listening experience.
5. Listen and enjoy your content in high-quality speech!

Perfect for:

- Students using text to speech for studying
- Professionals needing text to speech for efficient document review
- Language learners leveraging text to speech for pronunciation
- Anyone who prefers listening over reading

Experience the future of Text To Speech technology with Voice Out. Download now and start listening to your digital world!

For support or if you have any feedback, reach us at support@voiceout.app

Stay updated with the latest improvements and features of Voice Out text to speech at https://voiceout.app/new/
